plugins.prepareCmd: bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; mkdir -p artifacts; for csproj in src/FQ.*/*.csproj; do dotnet pack \"$csproj\" -c Release -o artifacts /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true /p:PackageVersion=${nextRelease.version}; done"
plugins.publishCmd: bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; shopt -s nullglob; set -- artifacts/*.nupkg; [ $# -gt 0 ] || { echo 'No packages to publish'; exit 1; }; for f in \"$@\"; do echo Pushing \"$f\"; dotnet nuget push \"$f\" --api-key \"${env.NUGET_API_KEY}\" --source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json --skip-duplicate; done"
